requirement.message: We're sorry, but LittleShoot requires Tiger (OSX 10.4) or above to run. We apologize for the inconvenience and hope you can use LittleShoot in the future.

We're sorry, but LittleShoot requires Java 5 or above to run. You should be able to use Software Update to install the latest version of Java from Apple. You can find Software Update in the apple menu in the upper left corner of your screen. We apologize for the inconvenience.

We're sorry, but LittleShoot requires Java 5 or above to run. You should be able to use Software Update to install the latest version of Java from Apple. You can find Software Update in the apple menu in the upper left corner of your screen. We apologize for the inconvenience.
